content: The Tiger's Acolyte is very fast and very strong. Immobilize will be a big help here, as will perfect dodging. The longer you tussle on the bridge, the more chance you have of falling off. Pull out all your spells in this fight to defeat him as quickly as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger's_Acolyte_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger's Acolyte Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Tiger's Acolyte Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger's Acolyte is very fast and very strong. Immobilize will be a big help here, as will perfect dodging. The longer you tussle on the bridge, the more chance you have of falling off. Pull out all your spells in this fight to defeat him as quickly as possible.
